descriptions.label: Application
values: Versatile brominating agent. For the oxidation of tryptophan though tyrosine, histidine and methionine residues may be oxidized to a lesser extent. Also used for the modification of ribosomal sulfhydryl groups.

descriptions.label: Legal Information
values: ReagentPlus is a registered trademark of Sigma-Aldrich Co. LLC
